SELECT o.id AS id, u.user_id as userId, u.nick_name AS nickName, u.wx_account AS wxAccount, s.user_id AS sysUserId, u.mobile_phone AS mobilePhone, CASE WHEN o.org_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isAdd, IFNULL(rr.role_id, '') AS roleId, IFNULL(sr.role_code, '') AS roleCode FROM cms_user u LEFT JOIN cms_adopt_org_user o ON u.user_id = o.user_id AND o.is_valid = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user s ON o.sys_user_id = s.user_id AND s.is_valid = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_rel rr ON s.user_id = rr.user_id AND rr.is_valid = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON rr.role_id = sr.role_id AND sr.is_valid = 1 WHERE u.is_valid = 1 and u.mobile_phone is not null
and o.org_id is null
and o.org_id =#{orgId}
and u.wx_account like CONCAT(#{wxAccount},'%')
and u.mobile_phone like CONCAT(#{mobilePhone},'%')
ORDER BY s.create_date DESC
